snippet: Experts say it’s not enough for a smartphone or other gadget to have all the software bells and whistles, it must also look and feel good.
abstract: Molly Wood Machine Learning column examines how design has been increasingly important in consumer technology like smartphones and wearable devices; notes that importance of design has led to start-ups founded or co-founded by designers being picked up at more rapid rate than those that emphasize technology or software.
lead_paragraph: Experts say it’s not enough for a smartphone or other gadget to have all the software bells and whistles, it must also look and feel good.

headline.print_headline: Design Gains Importance as Devices Get More Personal
headline.main: Video Feature: Design Gains Importance as Devices Get More Personal
